permissions: Admins can list all business unit memberships. Non-admins are limited to memberships for business units where they already have a membership.
validation_notes: Filters accept comma-separated IDs for business-unit and membership. kind filter must be one of: manager, technician, general.

flags.name: --business-unit
flags.description: Filter by business unit ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of business unit IDs.

flags.name: --membership
flags.description: Filter by membership ID (comma-separated for multiple)
